title: Santa Ynez Band of Chumash Mission Indians Land Transfer Act of 2013
content: Santa Ynez Band of Chumash Mission Indians Land Transfer Act of 2013 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to take specified lands in Santa Barbara County, California, into trust for the Santa Ynez Band of Chumash Mission Indians if the Tribe transfers title to that land to the United States. Makes that land part of the Santa Ynez Indian Reservation. Prohibits gambling on the land.
